Uses of Package
net.sourceforge.zmanim.util

  • Packages that use net.sourceforge.zmanim.util 
    Package Description
    net.sourceforge.zmanim
    The Zmanim library is an API for a specialized calendar that can calculate different astronomical times including sunrise and sunset and Jewish zmanim or religious times for prayers and other Jewish religious dutuies.
    net.sourceforge.zmanim.util
    The util package contains the utility classes for the Zmanim API including classes to calculate sun based times, location information and some formatting utils.
  • Classes in net.sourceforge.zmanim.util used by net.sourceforge.zmanim 
    Class and Description
    AstronomicalCalculator
    An abstract class that all sun time calculating classes extend.
    GeoLocation
    A class that contains location information such as latitude and longitude required for astronomical calculations.
  • Classes in net.sourceforge.zmanim.util used by net.sourceforge.zmanim.util 
    Class and Description
    AstronomicalCalculator
    An abstract class that all sun time calculating classes extend.
    GeoLocation
    A class that contains location information such as latitude and longitude required for astronomical calculations.
    Time
    A class that represents a numeric time.
